briefTitle: Phase 3 Herniorrhaphy Study for Postoperative Analgesia (EPOCH 2)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double Blind, Saline Placebo and Active Controlled, Multicenter Study of HTX 011 Via Local Administration for Postoperative Analgesia and Decreased Opioid Use Following Unilateral Open Inguinal Herniorrhaphy
summary: This is a Phase 3, randomized, double-blind, saline placebo- and active-controlled, multicenter study to evaluate the analgesic efficacy and safety of HTX 011 administered via local administration into the surgical site in subjects undergoing unilateral open inguinal herniorrhaphy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Area Under the Curve (AUC) of the Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) Pain Intensity Scores With Activity (NRS-A) Through 72 Hours Postsurgery (AUC0-72), Compared With Saline Placebo.
